Text:
Revision_1.0_Update:
http://pastebin.com/myvw3aDe

* cleaned up a few files i forgot to take care of before packaging.
* install Lightroom first, then apply this revision.
After applying the revision, any other thing needed to be done? What are the pictures for?
How do I prevent it from always showing me to put serial after exiting and starting again? Why does the program not show in list of programs in the computer?

Thanks XxFukenGruvenxX

I wanted this as a portable app, now I think I will be downloading most of your stuff and buying more USB drives.

One point with Lr Portable, the x64 asks for a serial or take 30 day trial... The x32 works perfect. I used the revision!!

CC1

Thanks again
XxFukenGruvenxX, your link for the revision download is not available anymore. Can you replace that?
